Name: ReBall
About the game: Welcome to the game ReBall. This is a minimalistic arcade puzzle game in the genre breakout. Aim and shoot the ball to hit the figures with numbers. The numbers shows the strength of the figures. More strenght - more hits it takes before destroy. Along the way, collect the same balls as yours to launch several shots. Gradually, the figures will be generated in even more quantity and strength. The game will be over as soon as the pieces hit the bottom.
